title: Razer's Black Friday Event Includes Price Cuts For Gaming Laptops, Keyboards, And More
description:
Razer has officially kicked off its Black Friday 2023 Cyber Weekend event, giving you a chance to save big on laptops, headsets, keyboards, and other popular accessories. The deals will run until November 28, so you only have a few days to peruse the catalog and find something that fits your needs--though the hottest items could sell out before the final day.

If you want help sifting through all the deals, we've put together some of the highlights. This includes everything from $1,500 price cuts on laptops to some of the lowest prices we've seen for gamepads and mice.

See all deals at Razer

title: Snap Up a Great Fujifilm Instamax Camera Deal For Black Friday And Make Some Memories
description:
Ask your parents about their favorite photographic memories, and they'll wax lyrical about those golden Kodak days when they could snap a photo and instantly receive a print. For Black Friday 2023, you can have your own instant photography moments, albeit with Fujifilm's line of Instax Mini cameras.

Normally $78, these are on sale for $55 and are available in lavender, light blue, and light pink pastel shades. As an added bonus, this package comes with a carrying case, a 10-pack of film, a photo album, and some stickers to put on your photos after you're done waving them in the air to get them to develop more quickly. While you're not going to win any photographic awards while using one of

title: Mario Kart Hot Wheels Tracks And Car Packs Get Big Discounts At Amazon For Black Friday
description:
Hot Wheels are some of the best and easiest gifts around. They're fun for all ages, the idea of making a diecast matchbox car defy gravity is universally appealing, and the cars themselves are artistic works of four wheel art. For Black Friday, Amazon is offering some big discounts on a wide range of Hot Wheels vehicles and tracks, including several exclusives and a handful of Mario Kart products such as the Circuit Track set for a big discount, a Super Mario Bros. Movie four-pack of cars, and an Amazon-exclusive four-pack. Most of these deals have limited quantities, so you'll want to burn rubber and grab these Hot Wheels cars and tracks before they're gone.

Black Friday Hot Wheels Car Pack Deals

title: Samsung Black Friday Deals - Save On Smartphones, Laptops, TVs, And More
description:
Samsung has officially kicked off its Black Friday sale, slashing prices on everything from smartphones and laptops to TVs and computer monitors. Many of these products are now available at their lowest price of the year--and if you still have a few things on your wishlist, this is a great time to cross them off. We've scoured the catalog for all the best deals, which you'll find below.

See all deals at Samsung

Once you're done perusing Samsung's sale, be sure to check out Walmart, as the retail giant is also hosting a huge Black Friday event with plenty of laptops, TVs, and other electronics included in the savings.

TVs

title: Save $150 On The Street Fighter 6 Collector's Edition In This Black Friday Deal
description:
Street Fighter 6 is easily one of the best fighting games of 2023, a glorious rebirth for the franchise that levels the playing field with some thoughtful ideas. If you haven't dived into Capcom's delightful brawler and you're looking for a pretty good Black Friday deal, then check out this special on Street Fighter 6's collector's edition from Amazon subsidiary Woot.

See at Woot

Normally priced at $250, you can pick one of these up for $100 during the next couple of days. Here's what you'll get inside of the Street Fighter 6: Mad Gear Edition.

title: All-In-One Game Table Deal - Get Foosball, Pool, Air Hockey, Ping Pong, And More For Only $130
description: If you're in the mood for some traditional gaming that doesn't require an online connection, this Black Friday deal on an all-in-one gaming table offers maximum bang for your buck. Traditionally, you can't use a Foosball table to play snooker--unless you've got really strong wrists--but with this table, you get 10 games in one space-saving piece of furniture. Normally $170, you can grab this for $130.

title: Get Some Free Money With These Nintendo, PlayStation, And Xbox Gift Card Deals
description:
Who doesn't love free money? That's the Black Friday deal on right now at Walmart, although as the old saying goes, you'll have to spend some money to make some money. Walmart is offering 10% discounts on all PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo eShop gift cards for Black Friday, saving you more cash the bigger you go with your purchases. That's not too bad, and the more you buy, the quicker those discounts will stack up.

  • PlayStation Store gift card
  • Nintendo eShop gift card for Switch

title: SpongeBob SquarePants: The Cosmic Shake Collector's Edition Is Very Cheap For Black Friday
description:
Who lives in a pineapple under the sea? SpongeBob SquarePants! And now that catchy sea shanty is stuck in your head, it's time to check out this Black Friday deal on SpongeBob SquarePants: The Cosmic Shake BFF Edition. A massive collector's edition of the game, this would normally cost you $250 but it's on sale for $60 for the next week. It's possibly worth it for an inflatable balloon buddy alone.

See at Woot

title: League Of Legends' Core Map Is Getting Some Major Changes Next Season
description:
League of Legends is making some major changes to its main map, Summoner's Rift, ahead of the 2024 season start next year. The changes will include both visual and gameplay updates to monsters, as well as terrain changes and other gameplay updates.

The influence of the Void will create some major changes to the Rift in the new year, resulting in both aesthetic and gameplay changes to Baron, jungle camps, and the Rift Herald, as well as introducing an all new type of monster.

As well as a visual update that gives him hands for the first time, Baron Nashor is getting three new forms that will grant him additional abilities as well as changing the terrain around the Baron pit. Hunting Baron will leave the pit unchanged but grant him a lightning blast ability, Territorial Baron creates a small wall in front of the pit and sees him using his newfound hands to pull champions towards him, while All-Seeing Baron

title: The Super Pocket Is A Great Gift Idea For Retro Gaming Enthusiasts This Holiday
description:
With two handhelds, a home console, and 50-plus cartridge-based compilations (and counting) to its name already, Blaze Entertainment has built an impressive retro gaming ecosystem with its Evercade brand. Cornering an enthusiast sector of the industry was a smart move, and Blaze's latest retro hardware is its cleverest play yet. Branded under an offshoot of Evercade dubbed Hyper Mega Tech, the Super Pocket charmingly pays homage to the Game Boy. These truly pocket-sized handhelds--not always a given in today's portable market--offer tremendous value at just $60 a pop and would make for an awesome nostalgia gift this holiday.

You can choose between

title: Destiny 2 Is Removing A One-Hit Kill Move From PvP
description:
Destiny 2 is patching out a move that allowed players to one-hit kill an enemy in PvP by using a shoulder charge or slide melee, with the change coming into place at the start of Season of the Wish.

The new restriction on one-hit kills follows on from a change made almost two years ago in update 3.4.0, which stopped the Titan's shoulder charge ability from giving a guaranteed one-hit kill. Bungie explains that players found a way to work around this change, getting one-hit kills by sliding, firing their weapon, and then continuing into a shoulder charge or slide melee.

As of Season of the Wish, players will no longer be able to initiate a shoulder charge or slide melee if they've already fired a weapon in the slide. The melee abilities impacted by this change include:

title: Destiny 2 Fireteam Finder Is Getting An Open Beta
description:
Bungie has offered an update on its upcoming Fireteam Finder tool for Destiny 2, revealing that it will be opening a beta to all players to help stress test the new feature. Despite usually keeping beta tests in house, Bungie explained that it will be open testing Fireteam Finder in order to get it launch-ready faster.

In a new dev blog, Bungie has explained its plans and desired outcomes for the beta, especially to "deliver a first-class Fireteam Finder for all activities by The Final Shape," through "a schedule of multiple testing phases that progressively refine the new feature." Bungie has also said it plans to "be nimble" with the testing phase, modifying the beta process as it goes based on any new information or issues that arise.

The first pla

title: Get Star Wars Jedi: Survivor For Only $30 On PS5 And Xbox Series X
description:
If you can't get enough Star Wars in your life, then Respawn Entertainment's small slice of lightsaber-wielding action is not to be missed. Star Wars Jedi: Survivor, one of the biggest games of 2023, is on sale for only $30 for PS5 and Xbox Series X at multiple retailers for Black Friday 2023. Unsurprisingly, this $40 discount drops the price to its lowest ever, so now's a great time to continue the adventures of Cal Kestis as he faces off against the Empire and its deadly enforcers.
